title: The Small Town Preacher's Fake Marriage
description: He has to get married...Fast...But will an ad in the paper really find him a bride?Seth doesn't need a love match. What he needs is a partner; someone who will help him watch over a small flock.Evie is tired of all the dating games and her heart is sore. When she sees the ad for a wife, she's prompted to apply. Seth is everything she's always wanted, and just out of reach.For these two, getting married is the easy part.You'll love this small town romance with a mail-order bride twist!Start reading today.
author: Lucy McConnell
